column2: Has Taken a Loan From a Bank
You are low on funds and can request a loan.
You've decided you want to grant loans throughout the Realm from your Central Bank.
Close your bank and stop giving out loans.
Open the books and review your outstanding loans.

[FromFrom.GetTitledName] has sent word of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] dire financial straits and requests a loan. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] requests 100 gold which [FromFrom.GetSheHe] will promise to repay in time.
[From.GetFirstName] has died and passed [From.GetHerHis] due loans to you.
[From.GetFirstName] has died and passed [From.GetHerHis] loan debts to you.
[From.GetFirstName] has come to you about the state of [From.GetHerHis] loan from your bank and...
Presents a bag of money to you.
Cannot pay - Forgive the Loan for a favor.
Cannot pay - Declare Default and imprison them.
[From.GetFirstName] has come to you about, your vassal, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s debts demanding [FromFrom.GetSheHe] be sent in chains.
Very well, send the guards for [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName] has dispatched guards for your arrest, you've been declared a criminal for defaulting on your debts.
Black's not such a bad look...
[From.GetFirstName] has acknowledged [From.GetHerHis] debt and arrived in the prison.
[From.GetFirstName] evaded your guards and fled to the Nightswatch, swearing the Black.
[From.GetFirstName] evaded your guards and fled to a foreign court, and now stands outside your grasp.
[From.GetFirstName] has received your demand and sent along [From.GetHerHis] vassal's payment, [From.GetSheHe] states "Please consider the matter settled and remove the default".
[From.GetFirstName] has dismissed your demand and protected [From.GetHerHis] vassal, [From.GetSheHe] states you can "Go Hang".
You have a loan that has come due.
You have a loan that has come due.
[From.GetFirstName] has finally worked off the debt and requests to be released from the dungeons.
